page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: During the week I get up at seven o'clock. I get dressed and washed before going downstairs to breakfast at 7:30p.m. At 8:30 I catch the school bus. I get to school at 8:55. At nine o'clock school begins. We have registration, then assembly. We work until 10:35 then have a break until 10:50. Then we have P.E. or a television program until lunch at 12. Afternoon school begins at 1:15a.m. We have music and art and finish the day with a story. The school bus collects us at 3:30. When I get home I ride my bike until teatime. After tea I watch the television until my bedtime which is 8:30p.m.
